channel.title: Alexandre Gallice on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Alexandre Gallice on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Integration in the cloud era with Camel Quarkus
item.description: Apache Camel is the proven integration swiss knife for years. In today’s world of workloads moving to the cloud, the need for disparate systems to communicate remains more than ever. This context makes a Kubernetes Java stack like Quarkus a good fit to implement Camel routes. In this session, the attendance can first expect a quick reminder about Camel Quarkus basics. Beyond, some day to day useful features will be presented via concrete examples.
